tha-ap139:0.3_0: he has laid down his swords, sometimes the senior monks.
tha-ap139:1.2_0: I saw the world speed upon the world.
tha-ap139:1.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
tha-ap139:10.1_0: For the seventh senior, the senior.
tha-ap139:2.1_0: These seven proficient in the three Vedas,
tha-ap139:2.3_0: in the assemblies of the Buddha,
tha-ap139:3.3_0: Eternal knowledge of the ending of knowledge,
tha-ap139:4.1_0: His body is prostitute and moral,
tha-ap139:4.3_0: Since it is transferred to another,
tha-ap139:6.2_0: the Buddha’s teaching, and the Buddha:
tha-ap139:6.4_0: that leads to a bad place.
tha-ap139:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap139:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kandā with these verses.
